title: Burn
description: Their kiss is powerful enough to burn everything...Amalia knew kissing the guy she's fallen for would be dangerous, but she didn't think it would be deadly. But now one of her friends is dead, and someone else is missing.To make things more complicated, there's a visitor in town who has everyone in Shadow Hill on edge.Amalia's goal is to stay alive and make sure no one she loves gets hurt, but that seems easier said than done.
author: Jody Morse
